creator: fhimpe@vub.ac.be
text:
Created attachment 30717
backtrace

Apache 2.4.6 crashes here every few days and I managed to get the attached backtrace from the core file.


I'm using Apache 2.4.6, Event MPM, libapr 1.4.6, libaprutil 1.5.2 running on Debian Wheezy.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
3. Explore process

Process (unknown pid)
99 threads:
MPM child worker thread (waiting for connection to handle)
apr_thread_cond_wait<ap_queue_pop_something<worker_thread<dummy_worker
Show each thread...
1 thread:
MPM child listener thread (waiting for connection to accept)
apr_pollset_poll<listener_thread<dummy_worker
Show each thread...
1 thread:
Event MPM child main thread (waiting for termination event)
ap_event_pod_check<child_main<make_child<server_main_loop<event_run<ap_run_mpm<main
Show each thread...
1 thread:
MPM child worker thread (reading client request)

Closing this task due to its age but please reopen it if you are still experiencing the issue.
